character.age: 335 years old, but appears to be in his mid-50s due to dwarven longevity
character.role: Main Protagonist, Seeker of Lost Knowledge
character.background: Eryndor was born in the ancient dwarf city of Kragnir, where he spent most of his youth studying the arcane and learning the ways of the elder dwarves. He set out on a perilous journey to uncover the secrets of his people's lost past.

physical-appearance.hair-color: Dark brown, worn long and braided
